caption.paragraph:
Figure 13: Map of Fars Province showing distribution of
Scorpio maurus townsendi (Pocock, 1900)
,
Hemiscorpius lepturus Peters, 1861
and
Hemiscorpius sp.
(?
H. gaillardi (Vachon, 1974) )
collected in this study.

Figures 14–18:
Hemiscorpius sp.
(?
H. gaillardi (Vachon, 1974))
, dorsal and ventral views, trichobothrial pattern, carapace and pectinal areas, juvenile male (25 mm).
